game.name: BMX Online
game.description:
Playing against the other players is the best thing to do online to pass your vacant hours. In order to respect your desires for trying out the best multiplayer games, we have today got you covered with a brand new racing challenge where you have to win a multiplayer bike rally against two other. Does not it sound pretty challenging, friends? Join BMX Online and be prepared to paddle as fast as you can to stay ahead of your opponents!

You would be given unlimited chances to earn bonus points. Try to work hard on learning how to perform the death-defying stunts using your bike and increase your points in this HTML5 bicycle game! Hey! Every front or back flip will help you to secure a speed bonus. Avoid tipping over too far or making a wrong landing otherwise your bike will get crashed and you will lose your game. You will be allowed to respawn your cyclist so you can continue where you left off, but you will lose time by doing so in this one of the best stunt biking games.

Put your insane racing abilities to the test to execute each competition flawlessly and earn some rewards for your good work! Grab points and money and use them to unlock the additional characters in this BMX sports game! Select random opponents and head on to race your chosen vehicle against the two other players! Gain extra speed by performing one or more flips in this fun multiplayer game! Drive bicycle at high speed to take the lead and leave the other players behind! Good luck to secure the first position!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game BMX Online at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
